title: Am I screwed if my attendance is <75 in few subjects?
content: I'm in 2nd sem and I have 80/85 attendance in all subjects rn but I wanted to take more holidays in the week before exams. Will a medical certificate work or are they really that serious about attendance this time?

comments.body: I think it depends on how much lesser. I think 70-75 is fine, but then again things might be different now.
exactly which is why alot of people are confused

If I remember correctly, attendance after a certain date isn't counted. For us this date was the day they released the list of defaulters with low attendance. If you know when that date is, you can simply ensure you have >75 until that date.
ahh okay that makes sense. I'll check about the date for it. thanks :)

In the department they're making people sit for extra hours during the study break to make up for less attendance
S&H department I'm not quite sure
PES isn't that strict about attendance, around 70% should be fine with some medical certificates but don't go below that
